name: ProductDyno
author: ProductDyno

sections.description:
A new way to securely deliver ALL of your digital content, license your software/plugins and much more – All without the headaches of using complex, limiting or expensive software services…

WORDPRESS PLUGIN MAKES IT EASY TO SECURE YOUR WORDPRESS PAGES!

If you run your website on WordPress, you’re in luck because we’ve created a plugin that makes it super easy to secure your content directly into your WordPress pages! We’ve worked hard to make sure your secure content isn’t compromised!

WHAT IS UNIQUE ABOUT THIS PLUGIN THAN OTHER MEMBERSHIP PLUGINS?
Unlike other WordPress membership plugins, ProductDyno WordPress Plugin allows you to run any number of membership programs under one domain.

Note: You will need an active ProductDyno account to use this plugin.

Here’s What ProductDyno Can Do For You!

Have a peek below at a system that will remove every obstacle you have when creating, delivering and securing your content.

UNLIMITED CLIENTS

Zero restrictions on how many members you can have in your account. Sell 100 products or 100,000 products – It’s up to you!.

UNLIMITED DOWNLOADS

Zero restrictions on how many times your products are downloaded. Single files, streaming content, bundles, zips – No limits.

UNLIMITED PRODUCTS

Act now and grab a VIP level account and you can protect all your current and future products all under one powerful dashboard.

AMAZING INTEGRATIONS

ProductDyno provides seamless connections to payment platforms, autoresponder/mail services plus webhooks / Zapier integration.

FUTUREPROOF PLATFORM

At ProductDyno we’re committed to ongoing platform development to guarantee long-term scalability & value for users.

USER MANAGEMENT

Quickly track orders, customers, downloads and much more. Everything at your fingertips so you stay on top of your business.

FULLY AUTOMATED SYSTEM

Once set the product delivery/user management system is fully automated freeing up your time for other business tasks.

DELIVERS ACCESS EMAIL

No more form filling for your buyers. The second their purchase is complete they’ll receive access creditials without delay.

REVOKE PRODUCT ACCESS

Deter serial refunders and prevent ‘digital pirates’ from accessing your products with just a simple click of your mouse.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress at least 3.0.1 or greater
  • PHP version 5.2 or greater

Installation

  1. Login to your ProductDyno account, click on left navigation link ‘WordPress Plugin’ and download it. Upload productdyno.zip which you have just downloaded to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. You may also search ProductDyno plugin on wordpress plugins search durectory by keyword productdyno.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Find ProductDyno on left navigation.
  5. Login to your ProductDyno application and Click on My Account on left and copy your API Key
  6. Back to your ProductDyno Plugin section, Click the connect box with unlock icon.
  7. Enter your API key.
  8. Create a new page or Edit any existing page, you will see ProductDyno box in top right corner.
  9. Select any product/collection which you have created on ProductDyno from dropdown
  10. Hurray! That’s it.
sections.faq:
How to get the API key?

Login to your ProductDyno account, click “My Account” from left navigation and copy your API key from this page.

How many membership sites can I secure with this plugin on a single domain?

As many as you want. Unlike other membership plugins, we do not restrict you to running only one secure membership on a single domain.

Do I need an active ProductDyno account to use the plugin?

Yes, you will need an active ProductDyno account.

My question is not answered here, what should I do?

Please contact our support and we will be happy to help you out.
sections.changelog:
1.0.23 – 2024-04-05

  • Added compatibility with WordPress latest released version 6.5
  • Fix: Validation alert classes according to response

1.0.22 – 2023-11-07

  • Added compatibility with WordPress latest released version 6.3.2

1.0.21 – 2023-01-30

  • Fixed the URL scheme issue

1.0.20 – 2022-11-22

  • Added compatibility with WordPress latest released version 6.1.1

1.0.19 – 2022-10-07

  • Added compatibility with WordPress latest released version 6.0.2

1.0.18 – 2022-04-01

  • Added support for WP ‘Posts’
  • Added compatibility with WordPress latest released version 5.9

1.0.17 – 2021-10-25

  • Added compatibility with WordPress latest released version 5.8

1.0.16 – 2021-03-09

  • Added compatibility with WordPress latest released version 5.7
  • Fix: Show the Meta box always on the page editor sidebar if the account is connected or not.

1.0.15 – 2020-12-24

  • Fix: Data sanitization to prevent vulnerabilities

1.0.14 – 2020-12-23

  • Added compatibility with WordPress latest released version 5.6

1.0.13 – 2020-09-28

  • Fix: Upgraded JS deprecated method

1.0.12 – 2020-03-17

  • Fix: Collection product no access issue

1.0.11 – 2019-11-13

  • Added compatibility with WordPress latest released version 5.3

1.0.10 – 2019-06-14

  • Fix: Reset Password code cache issue

1.0.9 – 2019-05-29

  • Fix: PHP older version syntax error

1.0.8 – 2019-05-28

  • Add: Plugin disconnect option
  • Fix: PD logo action URL

1.0.7 – 2019-05-24

  • Add: Member registration
  • Add: Member logout
  • Fix: Free and Paid access issue

1.0.6 – 2019-05-23

  • Fix: Fetch public pages issue
  • Fix: Error catching while fetching pages

1.0.5 – 2019-05-22

  • Fix: Admin interface conflict issue
  • Update: Plugin detail description

1.0.4 – 2019-05-22

  • Fix: Minor typo
  • Update: Plugin description

1.0.3 – 2019-05-21

  • Fix: Restricted area default page

1.0.2 – 2019-05-17

  • Fix: echo data
  • Add: update support documentation link

1.0.1 – 2019-05-14

  • Fix: Conflict with other plugins

1.0.0

  • Initial version.
sections.screenshots:
1. API Key. Login to your ProductDyno and copy your API Key.

  2. Connect Plugin. Back to your Worpress, look the ProductDyno on left navigation and Click the connect button.

  3. Use Plugin. Click on the Pages on left navigation, create or edit any existing page, you will see on top right your ProductDyno checklists list in dropdown
sections.reviews:
ProductDyno is an awesome plugin!

By edigi on March 30, 2024

I really like the ProductDyno plugin! It locks my members area (all my member pages) and lets me create beautiful looking membership sites. The support team is always helpful and quick to reply. I highly recommend using ProductDyno to create membership sites with WordPress.

A Killer WP Plugin. Learn how to use it before rating it!

By williamglewis on July 7, 2019

When I first bought the platform there wasn't a plugin then. But this platform is great and they listen to your suggestions and ideas and add them as they update the software and now this new plugin. Now that this plugin is out it makes it super easy to secure your WP pages! PromoteLabs is an amazing company and know what they are doing in the internet marketing world. If you want to secure your digital products, sell collections, run memberships or even drip content this is the platform and plugin to use. But please, please, please take the time to watch all of the training videos they have inside the membership login so you can fully understand how everything works and use the plugin and the software to it's full potential. Giving a 1 star rating because you don't understand how to use the software, do the set-ups or apply the platform to what you are wanting to do, isn't fair to them or the software developers.

Awesome Plugin!

By doodz (dawnadoodz) on June 8, 2019

Easy to use plugin for you to deliver your WordPress content securely plus great support team!

So easy to turn content into membership site

By xemxie on June 3, 2019

One of the easiest "membership" plugins I've tried. Just "activate" on the pages to be protected and hey-presto... it's done. You do have to set up the product in ProductDyno first...

I wish there is 0 stars

By termoplus on May 29, 2019

I don't want to write long reviews so this is my opinion. 1. The idea of the project "5" stars 2. The production level "2" stars (too many things not ready yet) 3. Too many minor bugs "2" stars 4. Customer support "-100" stars (terrible and rude stuff). Even Comcast support is far better. 5. When you join any of their product, expect to be bombarded with tons of emails and up-sell products. This is the worst part when you feel that you see you as a walking wallet and trying to sell crap any given second. "1" star!
